content: {A笑眯眯}I know that sometimes, when you just let things be, floofalicious good things will come naturally maa. Like now, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>. Are you feeling lighter?

content: {A豆豆眼}I might risk oversleeping though! But that's how I got the idea for the <style=Highlight>Sunflower Glow Sofa</style>. I wrote it down on this Inspo Card! Here, it's for you.
